title: Nantuko Shaman
text: When Nantuko Shaman enters the battlefield, if you control no tapped lands, draw a card.Suspend 1— (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay  and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
